name: Watch Out For Number Two
description:
This is project made in 4 hours. Game Jam theme was "Only One". There are lot of ones. One controll button. One key. One level.  Enjoy game and sorry for my english.

Press 1 to turn around.

Press + hold 1 to turn around and jump.

U need to go to right part of the screen.

Fixed: Now u stop when you pass a stage, Game is more fair and fun to play. Enjoy!
